citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately
1:45 pm on 02/27/2014.
The inspector contacted the license holders upon arrival at the facility. The facility owners were leaving to do an
animal show and indicated that they would not be returning for a few hours.
A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection.

narrative:
